channel.title: Why won't it let me be admin?
channel.description:
Hi all, I have two questions:
1) I'm running testscape, i log on, play, log out, edit my player rights, log back in and im still normal!!! why?
2) Editing the bit after pickup command does nothing. I want everyone to be able to use it.
3) How do i make a command to make someone an admin? E.g ::admin nappymonster
Cheers,
Nappymonster

item.title: Why won't it let me be admin?
item.dc:creator: @nappymonster nappymonster
item.description:
@nappymonster wrote:

This definately works with player rights, somehow (dont know how) earlier i managed to make a level 3 player. Sadly it stopped working (must of been something i did) so had to delete the txt file

Nappymonster

Read full topic
item.source: Why won't it let me be admin?

item.title: Why won't it let me be admin?
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

some servers work with other ways of playerrights… some work with the char files, some with a folder called data with the files admins.txt, staff.txt and mods.txt in it, and some work with client.java

Read full topic
item.source: Why won't it let me be admin?

item.title: Why won't it let me be admin?
item.dc:creator: @nappymonster nappymonster
item.description:
@nappymonster wrote:

As far as i knew, you didn’t need to re-comile. I know i’m not admin because when i use ::pickup or ::tele it doesnt work.

Nappymonster

P.S if you know where the code is, please post the link

EDIT: I recompiled, and nothing. Everytime i change the player rights, save and close, when i open it again after playing on mopar, it is back to 0 :mad:

Thanks,

Nappymonster

Read full topic

no.1 i think its because either admins cant see the crown some servers have that…maybe

yup you can get a code so you can see your crown if its not that then i dont know sry
